<title>Ledger</title>

<h4>Ledger: Basic Home Accounting</h4>

Ledger is a home accounting program 
implemented entirely in javascript with Jsi.
It uses a web GUI and stores your data in a local in sqlite database.

<h4>Getting Ledger</h4>

Download the source for Jsi and run it using: <b>../Ledger/main.jsi</b>

Or do a "make ledger.zip" and run it from the zip file using: <b>jsish ledger.zip</b>

Alternatively you can download ledger.zip from [http://jsish.org/downloads|here],
but this version may not be up to date.
